main-page.herow_title: Bus Tickets — Comfortable Travel across Ukraine and Europe | GreenBus
main-page.buses_description: Travel comfortably without overpaying. Modern buses, convenient schedules, and thousands of destinations in one place. Book tickets to Europe in just a few minutes.
main-page.сarriers_description: We partner only with verified companies. Compare ratings, read real reviews, and choose the best service at the best price.
main-page.get_started_description: Organize your trip in a few clicks. Our interactive map helps you choose a route, compare travel times, and check comfort levels. Add stopovers and build the perfect path through your favorite cities.
main-page.questions_description: Answers to key questions about booking, luggage, and travel. Can't find what you need? Our support is always online.
main-page.payment_description: Buy tickets online 24/7. Forget about ticket counters and cash — your ticket is already on your smartphone.
main-page.destinations_description: Tourism or business — we have routes for any purpose. Choose from over 50,000 route options.
main-page.secure_description: Your data is securely protected. We use international PCI DSS payment security standards.
main-page.refunds_description: Plans changed? Quickly get a refund through your personal account without unnecessary forms or calls.
